title: Reverse a String
description: Write a function that reverses a string.

title: Calculate Fibonacci Sequence
description: Write a function to calculate the Fibonacci sequence up to a given number.

title: Check for Palindrome
description: Write a function that checks whether a given string is a palindrome.

title: Find Maximum Subarray Sum
description: Write a function that finds the maximum sum of a contiguous subarray within an array.

title: Calculate Factorial
description: Write a function to calculate the factorial of a given number.
